Description:
COLLECTING POOL OF CANDIDATES FOR OUR UPCOMING PROJECTS IN IRAQ!Duties And Responsibilities:The Program Manager will ensure the Program Management requirements are met and they will interact with each project manager to provide support and guidance on individual projects, including:Conveying the important relationship of each project to the overall program and organizational performance objectives
Working to ensure that the overall program structure and program management processes enable the program and its component teams to successfully complete their work and to integrate the components’ deliverables into the program’s end products, services, results, and benefits
Working to ensure that projects are organized and executed in a consistent manner and fulfilled within established standards
Resolving resource constraints and / or conflicts that affect multiple projects within a program
Aligning organizational / strategic direction that affects project and program goals and objectives; and
Resolving issues and change management within a shared governance structureResponsibilitiesProgram integration.
Program scope management.
Program time management.
Program cost management.
Program quality management
Program Human Resource Management
Program Communication Management
Program Risk Management
Design of new reports
Facilitate continuity and standardization across departments
Build and manage program teams
Serve as a point of contact for critical program requirements
Ensure program delivery following Charter and Execution PlanSkills
Skills: Bachelor's degree; Engineering, Construction Management, Advance degree preferred
Proficiency in software especially in Oracle Primavera P6, Oracle Unifier, software Estimating, Oracle BI, Oracle EBS and MS Office Suite.
Strong understanding of electric and gas utility business.
